timeline.message:
Further adapt integration tests to vert.x WebClient API

The standard features of WebClient are now being used for specifying
predicates on the HTTP response. All operations of the CrudHttpClient
now return a Future<HttpResponse<Buffer>> so that all clients can get
access to the full response instead of just the headers or buffer
respectively.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>
